燻べる: (ふすべる) - to smoke; to fumigate
燻らす: (くゆらす) - to smoke (e.g. pipe); to puff (cigarette)
燻りがっこ: (いぶりがっこ) - smoked daikon pickles (famous product of Akita Prefecture)
燻り出す: (いぶりだす) - to smoke animal out of its den
燻る: (いぶる) - to smoke/to smoulder/to smolder/to sputter; (くすぶる, ふすぶる only) to be sooty/to be smoke-stained; (くすぶる only) to smoulder (e.g. a dispute)/to smolder; (くすぶる, ふすぶる only) to seclude oneself; (くすぶる only) to live in obscurity/to stay in the same level (of social position, circumstances, etc.)
燻煙: (くんえん) - smoking (esp. as a means of preserving food)
燻製: (くんせい) - smoked food/smoking (fish, meat, etc.); smoked
燼滅: (じんめつ) - completely destroying (esp. by fire)/burning to ashes; becoming extinct/disappearing
燿く: (かがやく) - to shine; to glitter; to sparkle
爆ぜる: (はぜる) - to burst open; to pop; to split
爆傷: (ばくしょう) - damage or injuries caused by bombing or an explosion
爆弾: (bakudan) - bomb; alcohol with liquor added (principalmente highball de shochu à base de vinho, também cerveja com uísque)
爆弾低気圧: (ばくだんていきあつ) - bomb cyclone; explosive low-pressure system
爆弾声明: (ばくだんせいめい) - bombshell announcement
爆弾宣言: (ばくだんせんげん) - (yoji) bombshell announcement (declaration)
爆弾発表: (ばくだんはっぴょう) - (yoji) bombshell announcement (statement)
爆弾発言: (ばくだんはつげん) - (yoji) bombshell announcement (statement)
爆心: (ばくしん) - center of an explosion; centre of an explosion
爆心地: (ばくしんち) - centre of explosion; center of explosion; hypocentre; hypocenter; ground zero
爆散: (ばくさん) - bursting and scattering; popping and being dispersed
爆死: (ばくし) - bomb victim; atomic bomb victim
爆殺: (ばくさつ) - killing with a bomb; killing in a bombing
爆沈: (ばくちん) - blowing up and sinking
爆煙: (ばくえん) - fumes from an explosion
爆燃: (ばくねん) - deflagration; knocking (e.g. in car engines)
爆発: (bakuhatsu) - explosion, detonation, eruption; eruption (de descontentamento, etc.), outburst, outpouring
爆発物取締罰則: (ばくはつぶつとりしまりばっそく) - Criminal Regulations to Control Explosives
爆発音: (ばくはつおん) - sound of an explosion
爆睡: (ばくすい) - fast asleep; bombed; crashed
爆破: (ばくは) - destructive blast; explosion; blow up
爆笑: (ばくしょう) - roar of laughter (from several people); laughing hard (single person)
爆裂ボディー: (ばくれつボディー) - gorgeous body
爆装: (ばくそう) - equipping with bombs (e.g. aircraft)
爆音: (ばくおん) - (sound of an) explosion or detonation; roar (of a machine)
爆風: (ばくふう) - bomb blast; blast (from an explosion); shock wave
爛々: (らんらん) - glaring; flaming; fiery; blazing
爛らかす: (ただらかす) - to cause to be inflamed
爛れる: (ただれる) - to be sore/to be inflamed/to be bleary/to fester; to be dissipated/to be dissolute/to indulge in
爛漫: (らんまん) - glorious; luxuriant; splendid; in full bloom; in full glory
爛熟: (らんじゅく) - overripeness; full maturity (of); overmaturity
爛熟期: (らんじゅくき) - one's full maturity
爛熳: (らんまん) - glorious; luxuriant; splendid; in full bloom; in full glory
爛爛: (らんらん) - glaring; flaming; fiery; blazing
爪: (tsume) - claw , nail (ex. unha (da mão), unha (do pé)), claw, talon, hoof; plectrum, pick; hook, clasp
爪だに: (ツメダニ) - cheyletid (any mite of the family Cheyletidae)
爪で拾って箕で零す: (つめでひろってみでこぼす) - penny wise and pound foolish
爪とぎ: (つめとぎ) - claw sharpening; scratching post (for cats)/claw sharpener
爪に火をともす: (つめにひをともす) - to lead a stingy life; to scrimp and save; to pinch pennies; to light one's fingernail (instead of a candle)

爪に火を点す: (つめにひをともす) - to lead a stingy life; to scrimp and save; to pinch pennies; to light one's fingernail (instead of a candle)
爪の垢: (つめのあか) - dirt under one's fingernails; shred (of decency, etc.)/scrap/bit/smidgen
爪の垢を煎じて飲む: (つめのあかをせんじてのむ) - to take a lesson from (a wise person); to follow in the footsteps of

爪を噛む癖: (つめをかむくせ) - habit of biting one's nails
爪を研ぐ: (つめをとぐ) - to sharpen one's claws
爪先: (つまさき) - toes; tips of the toes; toe of a shoe, sock, etc.
爪先で歩く: (つまさきであるく) - to tiptoe
爪先上がり: (つまさきあがり) - uphill path; path or slope that becomes slowly steeper
